title: Rollback frontend to Version 6 experience (remove Version 8 branding/assets and restore Version 6 UI)

requirements.summary: Restore the production-served frontend to match Version 6 (remove Version 8 UI/branding/assets references and ensure a hard refresh loads the Version 6 experience).
acceptanceCriteria: Production no longer serves the Draft Version 8 build.
Production serves the same frontend and backend code/state behavior as Version 6.
A hard refresh in the browser loads the Version 6 experience (no cached Version 8 assets being referenced).
No new functional or UI changes are introduced beyond restoring Version 6.

file_operations.description: Revert centralized branding constants to the exact Version 6 values (app name/tagline/location/description) so all user-facing copy matches Version 6.

Revert Version 8 document metadata (title/description/favicon) back to the Version 6 values and ensure the favicon references the Version 6 generated asset under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (e.g., switch away from blue-nile icon if Version 6 used a different one).

Revert header/navigation/footer visuals to Version 6, including restoring Version 6 logo/icon references by updating image sources to the correct generated assets (e.g., use frontend/public/assets/generated/aquaflow-icon.dim_256x256.png instead of any Version 8 blue-nile assets if Version 6 used AquaFlow).

Revert the login page presentation to the Version 6 design by restoring Version 6 background/header imagery and icon references (e.g., switch to frontend/public/assets/generated/aquaflow-header-bg.dim_1600x400.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/aquaflow-icon.dim_256x256.png if those were the Version 6 assets), ensuring no Version 8 assets are referenced.

Revert report branding to Version 6 by restoring the Version 6 logo/icon asset used for embedding (update fetch() path away from any Version 8 blue-nile asset to the Version 6 generated asset, e.g., frontend/public/assets/generated/aquaflow-icon.dim_256x256.png) and ensure it uses the Version 6 BRANDING values.

Revert any Version 8 report-screen copy that names Version 8 branding (e.g., references to “Blue Nile company logo and branding”) back to the Version 6 wording consistent with frontend/src/config/branding.ts.

Revert routing/bootstrap UI behavior to match Version 6 (including any Version 8-only recovery/loading/error screen flows) while keeping the app’s authenticated navigation consistent with Version 6 and ensuring no new functional changes beyond the rollback.
